Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Paper giver: “Religious Terrorist Groups and Political Power: An Ambiguous Relationship”, SGIR Conference, University of Turin
Paper giver: “Fondamentalismo e democrazia nel mondo contemporaneo: I casi di Stati Uniti, Israele, Turchia e India” , SISP Conference, Catania
Panel convenor: panel on “Politica e religione nel mondo contemporaneo”, SISP Conference, Catania
Paper giver: “Religious Fundamentalism and Democracy: An Impossibile Relationship?”, University of Ljubljana, WISC Conference
Paper giver: “Verso un nuovo paradigma geopolitico? Il ruolo della religione nella politica estera turca negli anni del governo Erdogan” , University of Pavia, SISP Conference
Panel convenor: panel on “Religiously-Oriented Political Actors in Secular Democratic States: The Turkish Case in Comparative Perspective” ECPR General Conference, Potsdam
Paper giver: “Religiously-oriented political actors and foreign policy: The case of the AK Party in Turkey”, ECPR General Conference, Potsdam
Panel Convenor: panel on “Democrazia e identità” (with Rosita Di Peri), SISP conference, LUISS, Rome
Paper giver: “Il fondamentalismo religioso in scienza politica”, SISP conference, Rome
Paper giver: “Religion and Democratization: The Turkish Case”, WOCMES Conference, Barcelona
Paper giver: “The Paradox of Female Participation in Fundamentalist Movements”, CESNUR Conference, Turin
Panel convenor: panel on “Democrazia e religione” (with Cristiano Vezzoni), SISP conference, Venice
Presentation: “Religion and Knowledge as a Global Public Good”, Religions and Global Governance Conference, Trento

Scientific coordinator: ECPR Capital Lecture on Religion, Democracy and Civil Liberties, LUISS University, Rome, 21 January 2011 (http://sog.luiss.it/news/2010/12/19/21- january-2011-ecpr-capital-lecturereligio n-democracy-and-civil-liberties)
Presentation: “Religious Fundamentalism and Politics in Democratic Regimes”, Religion and Politics Working Group (RPWG), European University Institute, Fiesole
Panel convenor: panel on “La religione nelle relazioni internazionali” (with Valter Coralluzzo), SISP conference, Palermo
Panel convenor: panel on “Partis politiques et religion” (with Francesco Cavatorta), International Political Science Association (IPSA) Conference, Madrid
Paper giver: “Models of Religiously-Oriented Parties and Democratization”, International Political Science Association (IPSA) Conference, Madrid
Panel convenor: panel on “Religious Parties and Democratization” (with Francesco Cavatorta), International Political Science Association (IPSA) Conference, Madrid
Panel convenor: panel on “Religione ed elezioni” (with Alberta Giorgi), SISP Conference, Rome
Paper giver: “Transnational Religious Actors: The Case of the Gülen Movement in Turkey” (with Valeria Giannotta), SISP Conference, Rome
Paper giver: “La religione nelle primarie USA del 2012”, SISP Conference, Rome
Panel convenor: panel on "Attori religiosi transnazionali” (with Valter Coralluzzo), SISP Conference, Rome
Paper giver: “The Debate about Same-Sex Marriages/Unions in Italy’s 2006 and 2013 Electoral Campaigns”, ECPR General Conference, Bordeaux
Panel convenor: panel on “Religion and Democracy in Italy’s ‘Second Republic’”, SISP Conference, September 2013, Rome
Paper giver: “Religious issues and political debate in Italy 2001-2013” (with Alberta Giorgi), Conference on “Religion, Democracy and Law”, London Metropolitan University, London
Panel convenor: panel on “Public Debates on Religious/Ethical Issues in Western Europe” (with Alberta Giorgi), Conference on “Religion, Democracy and Law”, London Metropolitan University, London
Paper giver: “Italian Political Parties and Ethical/Religious Debates in 21st Century Italy”, Conference on “Rethinking Political Catholicism”, John Cabot University, Rome
Paper giver: “The Hizmet Movement in Transnational Perspective and Its Institutions in Italy”, SISP Conference, Perugia
Panel convenor: panel on “Religion, Secularism and Politics in 21st Century Turkey”, SISP Conference, Perugia
Panel convenor: panel on “Religion and Political Parties” (with Massimiliano Livi), SISP Conference, Perugia
Section convenor: section on “Politica e religione” (with Damiano Palano), SISP Conference, University of Perugia
Paper giver: “Italy and the Controversies around Religion-Related Issues: Overemphasizing Differences” (with Alberta Giorgi), Interdisciplinary Workshop on Religious Pluralism, EUI, Fiesole
Presentation: “Different Conceptions of Religious Pluralism in the Italian Political Debate”, Conference on “Religion in the Global World”, Sophia University, Florence
Section convenor: section on “Transnational Religion, Conflict and Dialogue”, EISA Pan-European Conference on International Relations, Giardini Naxos
Panel convenor: panel on “Religion, Dialogue and Peacebuilding”, EISA Pan-European Conference on International Relations, Giardini Naxos
Paper giver: “The Hizmet Movement in Transnational Perspective and its Institutions in Italy”, EISA Pan-European Conference on International Relations, Giardini Naxos
Scientific coordinator: Conference on Transnational Religious Movements, Dialogue and Development, University of Turin, Turin (http://turin-rel.blogspot.it/p/home-page.html)
Presentation: “The Hizmet Movement in Italy”; Conference on Transnational Religious Movements, Dialogue and Development, University of Turin, Turin
Paper giver: “Standing Sentinels, ‘Gender Conspiracies’ and Surrogate Mothers: The Recent Italian Debate on LGBT Issues”, ECPR General Conference, Prague
Panel convenor: panel on “The Rise and Rise of Religiously Oriented Parties”; ECPR General Conference, Prague
Paper giver: “Last but not Least: The Recent Italian Debate about the Regulation of Same-Sex Unions, and the Approval of the Cirinnà bill”, SISP Conference, Milan
Panel convenor: panel on “Gender and the Family as Bones of Contention in the Public Sphere”, SISP Conference, Milan

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Tutor in the PhD in "Scienza Politica e Relazioni Internazionali" (I supervised the theses of two PhD candidates, both successful). During this time, I also coordinated a teaching module in this PhD programme, entitled 'Un libro al mese'.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Lecturer (docente a contratto) in 'Scienza politica', corse of 60 hours, University of Turin, Cuneo.
Lecturer (affidamento) in 'Scienza Politica', course of 54 hours (9 CFU), University of Turin, Biella.

Lecturer (affidamento) in 'Scienza politica', University of Turin, degree program in 'Scienze dell'Amministrazione e consulenza del lavoro", 54 hours (9 CFU) in the academic years 2011-12, 2012-13, and 2013-14; 72 hours (12 CFU) in the academic years 2014-15, 2015-16, and 2016-17.

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: 2 biennial 'assegni di ricerca' funded by the Fondazione Cassa di Risparmio di Torino, for researches on "I movimenti fondamentalisti religiosi nei regimi democratici" (cofunded by the University of Turin) and " Turchia, Islam ed Europa. Il governo del partito islamico AKP e la politica estera turca negli anni della guerra al terrorismo" (cofunded by the the Centro Farneti, Turin).
Research fellow at the Centre d'Etudes et Recherches Internationales (CERI) in Paris.
Regular contributor to the online publication 'Aspenia online': 36 articles about international politics in Italian and English (https://www.aspeninstitute.it/aspenia-online/contributors/luca-ozzano)

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Convenor of the 'Politica e religione' standing group of the Società Italiana di Scienza Politica (SISP)
Member of the steering committee and webmaster of the 'Religion and Politics' RC43 research committee of the International Political Science Association (IPSA)
Member of the steering committee and webmaster of the 'Religion and Politics' standing group of the European Consortium for Political Research (ECPR)
Co-founder and member of the scientific committee of Contemporary Religions and Faiths in Transition (CRAFT), University of Turin, Dept. of Culture, politica e società

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Principal investigator for a research project on "Attori religiosi transnazionali: il movimento Hizmet di Fethullah Gülen e le sue attività in Italia", funded with € 7251,82 by MIUR/Unito (ricerca locale ex 60%)

Principal investigator for a research project on "Searching for Alternative Communitarianism, Religion and Economic Development. A trans-disciplinary analysis of the economic networks of the Focolare, Hizmet and Damanhur religious movements" (Acronym: SACRED), funded with € 73770,75 by the Compagnia di Sanpaolo foundation
